name: Ninja Trap
description: Meet Urban Ninja, the most hapless ninja ever to grace a touchscreen! An endless addictive arcade 2018 game with beautiful graphics and easy game play. Tap the ninja through each obstacle and make big score in go crossing abstacles game. By touching the wrong color your game will be over and you’ll have to start it again. Tap the Ninja precisely through avoid obstacles and jump to move upward You should take after the color design and avoid the abstacles,on every obstacle to cross it! Be mindful so as not to go through the wrong color, or you'll need to begin once more.
